group_1.narration: [textBlack:To Sena]
[textBlack:Since you invited me over for dinner,]@[textBlack:your parents don't worry about me]@[textBlack:anymore, but...]
[textBlack:You're still trying not to come home]@[textBlack:so late, right?]@[textBlack:That's why we keep looking for Labyrinths]@[textBlack:near your apartment complex.]
[textBlack:In the area you picked for that reason,]@[textBlack:we found a lot of Familiars.]
[textBlack:Does that mean there's a Witch]@[textBlack:close by?]
[textBlack:Next time, let's go and]@[textBlack:investigate it thoroughly.]
[textBlack:After all, you must also be really]@[textBlack:worried about the possibility of a]@[textBlack:Witch there, right?]
[textBlack:To Hanna]
[textBlack:Thanks for worrying about me!]@[textBlack:You're really nice.]
[textBlack:Ah, you know,]@[textBlack:on the way back from school]@[textBlack:I passed by a crepe shop.]
[textBlack:My classmates often go there.]@[textBlack:How about we go together next time?]
[textBlack:I hear the food is super tasty,]@[textBlack:I bet you'll love it!]
[textBlack:I'm really looking forward to it...]@[textBlack:I gotta save up money for that.]
[textBlack:To Sena]@[textBlack:No. Let's go look for Witches.]
[textBlack:Hey, that's the only thing]@[textBlack:you write about!]@[textBlack:I wish you'd talk about]@[textBlack:other things too...]
[textBlack:I'd like to use this as a chance to]@[textBlack:get to know you more, you know?]
[textBlack:For example...]@[textBlack:what's school like for you?]
[textBlack:...Let's talk about Witches instead.]
[textBlack:Ugh, you could at least]@[textBlack:answer my question...]
[textBlack:Oh, by the way, my parents have been]@[textBlack:going on and on about how I should]@[textBlack:invite you to our house again.]
[textBlack:What's your family like, Hanna?]@[textBlack:Should I go meet them too?]
[textBlack:That's none of your business.]
[textBlack:You sure are cold...]
[textBlack:You aren't going to write about]@[textBlack:anything other than Witches,]@[textBlack:are you?]
[textBlack:Fine then, let's see...]@[textBlack:Witches...]
[textBlack:You know, I wonder how many]@[textBlack:Witches there are around here.]
[textBlack:Magical Girls too,]@[textBlack:I wonder how many others there are?]
[textBlack:There must be more than just us.]@[textBlack:What kind of people could they be?]
[textBlack:You wanna meet them?]
[textBlack:You don't?]
[textBlack:Other Magical Girls]@[textBlack:would just be competition.]
[textBlack:For Grief Seeds? Huh...]@[textBlack:I guess that's one way of seeing it...]
[textBlack:For now, let's be cautious about]@[textBlack:any developments on that front.]
[textBlack:After all,]@[textBlack:if we can't replenish our magic,]@[textBlack:we probably won't be able to]@[textBlack:use it anymore...]

group_1.textCenter: I wouldn't be able to cast suggestions...

group_1.narration: When I realized something like that could happen,@I was overwhelmed by unspeakable anxiety.

group_1.textCenter: "I'm going out to have fun.@You can have the leftovers for dinner..."

group_1.narration: Using my suggestions,@I can forget about my mother who I never@see outside of the notes she leaves,@and about all my pain...
But I have Hanna with me now.@I don't need my suggestions to endure it anymore.
The thing is, I'm useless without my magic.
I rely heavily on suggestions during battle.@If I can't do that anymore,@I won't be able to fight properly as a Magical Girl.
And if that happens...@I'm sure Hanna will leave me.
That's the thing that scares me the most.
...I know.@I know that the reason Hanna@stays by my side...
is because I'm useful to her.
To her I'm not competition,@but a Magical Girl who can join forces with her...@and won't even ask for anything in return.
That's why Hanna is there for me.@In other words, there's no way she'd stay@if I could no longer help her...

group_1.textCenter: No... I don't want to be abandoned by her...[chara:104401:mouthOpen_0]

group_1.narration: She's the only one who still needs me@in the real world...
I don't care if she's just looking out for herself.@It doesn't matter to me what hidden@motives she might have.
I'll do anything to keep her with me...
